definitions.definition: An infestation of parasitic mites , Sarcoptes scabiei , causing intense itching caused by the mites burrowing into the skin of humans and other animals. It is easily transmissible from human to human; secondary skin infection may occur.

main_definition: ( pathology ) An infestation of parasitic mites , Sarcoptes scabiei , causing intense itching caused by the mites burrowing into the skin of humans and other animals. It is easily transmissible from human to human; secondary skin infection may occur.
